channel.title: Custom Interfaces
channel.description:
I've recently been taking a lot of work into developing a 317 old school server. The furthest customs items go is: Crossbows and Metal Bolts. It's taken me a while to get everything basically 100% as I like to finish what I start before moving onto something else.
Now for my metal bolts and crossbows, I have a feeling that many people are going to be requesting enchanted bolts and enchantments. I like things to be 100% so I've been taking a look into custom interfaces and wondering what I would need to get my magic interface to look like this:
This is the closest I could find to it but.. It was a version before this.
[center][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100428140250/runescape/images/thumb/d/d4/Standard_spellbook_2009-05-10.png/180px-Standard_spellbook_2009-05-10.png[/img][/center]
Then for a separate interface like this.
[center][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20081219143229/runescape/images/7/71/Enchant_Crossbow_Bolt_interface.gif[/img][/center]
[center]*THESE IMAGES ARE NOT MINE AND HAVE BEEN USED FROM RUNESCAPE.WIKIA.COM*[/center]
Thanks -- Future Reference.
-- SmD

item.title: Custom Interfaces
